comments.en:
For basic printing functionality use the HPIJS driver . For advanced functionality such as printer status and maintenance features, use the HPLIP driver (which includes HPIJS).

600 dpi in colour is not supported by the hardware.

Older user comments:

Using LPRng with apsfilter as the "if". Send all non-ps documents through a2ps, and then everything out through Ghostscript. Still need to setup color printcap entries (I haven't had a need yet) but I don't foresee any problems with this.

Hardware only does 600x300 in color.

So this printer should work with some or all of the "cdj670", "cdj550", or "pcl3"/"hpdj" drivers. The very finest printing modes are probably not supported, nor is head alignment.

Consumables/Refills: HP51649A (color); HP51629A (black)
